p: Specific warnings and precautions of use. Due to a uterine stimulant effect ( Vafaei et al., 2020), products containing C. momol resin should be avoided in pregnancy and lactation ( EMA, 2011d). The concomitant use of C. molmol with theophylline or cyclosporine A should be avoided ( Al-Jenoobi et al., 2015a; Al-Jenoobi et al., 2015b; EMA, 2018a).
